Reviews.Title: “Best Customer Service of Any Courtyard I've Visited”
Reviews.Author: CultureSleuth
Reviews.Content: Want to feel welcome and appreciated? You won't likely do better than here. While the rooms are typically Courtyard and the exercise room is small (though with an assortment of machines), this hotel has several things to its credit. The lobby is modern and a great social meeting place - very comfortable. The wine selection is great and the food good. I LOVED the Asian chicken salad enough to order it a second night! But what I most appreciated was the entire staff and their friendly attitude. Most notably Nick, who went out of his way to secure me a good room and Chrissy, who couldn't have been more service-oriented at the bistro. Even the shuttle driver was fun - as well as efficient. I will use this Courtyard anytime I return to Indy.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: pedalmom
Reviews.Content: We had a good stay here the night before we were flying out. Front desk clerk was excellent, and kindly offered to let us pay a small reasonable amount to keep both our cars at the hotel during our trip rather than having to use airport parking. Shuttle comes on the half hour and was convenient both going to and coming back from airport. Lobby is very nice with fresh decorating. Room was quiet and pleasant. Have to say beds were unusually uncomfortable for a Marriott Courtyard.

Reviews.Title: “Good if traveling through”
Reviews.Author: Int_Bus_Travel
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel if you're looking for quick access to the airport or passing through Indianapolis on I-70. The staff upon check in were friendly, efficient, and helpful. The lobby has been re-done in new Courtyard modern style. It is a nice place for a snack and drink. Computer kiosks and free wireless are welcomed. The rooms are adequate, nothing special but good if you're just looking for a night's sleep. The pool and hot tub are also pretty standard for a Courtyard (have I seen it in Denver or maybe Rochester); they were appreciated after a long day. You could do worse.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay ...”
Reviews.Author: GBo_32
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel, nothing fancy. It is new, clean, had good service, room was very accommodating for my wife & I. If your looking for a nice, comfortable place to stay then this is your hotel. Close to freeway and not far from airport.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Marriott Property”
Reviews.Author: larry_kak
Reviews.Content: This Courtyrad has the new lobby and room arrangement. Some of the furniture in the rooms is a little dated but very clean. The staff is GREAT, great attitude, I liked that, knew the area and ways around the construction. Definitely will use again.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, easy to find, great room”
Reviews.Author: alleycat96
Reviews.Content: we stayed 1 night for a girls night out at 8 second saloon. check in was easy, room was clean. Raymond checked us in quickly and was very attentive. He gave us some info about area where we were going, helped us arrange transportation to the venue. Everyone was very pleasant and room was clean, beds were very comfy and our stay was GREAT!! would definitely stay again.. also didn't hear airplanes.. even though we thought we might.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and Quality Location”
Reviews.Author: HeyNow99
Reviews.Content: The Courtyard Airport Marriott is a little older, but the staff and housekeeping do a fantastic job. Very good location and easy to get to. Need some more restaurant locations in the area but did find one down the street called "The Library" which was excellent. Very good value in this area.

Reviews.Title: “Nice comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: mcbearcatfan
Reviews.Content: We stayed here over a weekend. The staff was very helpful and gave us tips and directions to the state fair. Good food in the hotel restaurant and very clean rooms and lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasure”
Reviews.Author: allybabalove
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I have stayed here at least once a year for a few years so I decided it's time to write a well-deserved review! This hotel is pretty great for being one by an airport (I think of loud rooms when I hear this). The rooms are always clean, QUIET, always high water pressure, and most importantly breakfast is served hot, free, and on-time! :) The staff are always SO accommodating, and really just make the whole experience great. The breakfast here in my opinion is phenomenal! All you can eat and drink and spread out on a counter so no one's in anyone else's way in the early morning! We always stay here for a night before our plane takes off to make it easier to get to the airport on-time as they have a free airport shuttle that picks up on the hour every hour. They also allowed us to park our car in the corner of their back lot for the few days we were on vacation, I can't even begin to tell you what a HUGE help that was to us! Thanks again for a great stay as always!

Reviews.Title: “Great spot, decent price, gotta a great deal on Priceline”
Reviews.Author: justthe4ofus
Reviews.Content: The room was clean, staff was helpful and nice. The food court area was cute, fun and not horribly overpriced. Pool was indoor but you had to walk out to the courtyard to get to it, kinda inconvenient,but not too bad.

Reviews.Title: “Older Property - Don't let the lobby fool ya'”
Reviews.Author: RGoltsch
Reviews.Content: This is a Marriott Courtyard that seems to have been built in the mid-80's. While Marriott has been redoing some of these older properties, this one has a split personality. You walk in to a welcoming, warm 21st century lobby. It has kiosks instead of a front desk, there is a bar and restaurant. But when you leave that area and head for your room, it is like a time warp.....back to the 80's. The elevator takes you up to a hallway with new carpet, but it still looks dingy under the dim lighting. The rooms are small. I have stayed in many other Marriott Courtyard properties, and my room with a king size bed and couch was tight. Just not as roomy or airy as others I have stayed in. The window overlooking the courtyard was small. The room was clean, the bathroom really shined. The bed was well worn, especially on the side near the door. I felt as if I was sleeping in a hole the one night I stayed there.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful customer service”
Reviews.Author: KimEriePa
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights for a family wedding. Check in was quick and easy. Nik at the front desk was very helpful. He was very pleasant, quick with results and always had a smile. We asked for a fridge for our room and Nik had someone bring it in less that a half an hour. He also helped with many questions and other requests. The lobby had lots of seats and a great place to visit. There was a Starbucks, small resturant and bar. The pool and courtyards were very nice also.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay when going to see the Indy 500”
Reviews.Author: JasonC12
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful Courtyard prpoerty with a stunning lobby. This hotel is located rather close to the airport and was a terrific place to stay when attending the Indy 500. The rooms were standard for a Courtyard, which is to say that they are comfortable, clean and attractive. Downtown Indianapolis was only about a 10 minute drive.

Reviews.Title: “Great place! Wish we could have enjoyed it more.”
Reviews.Author: ccg001
Reviews.Content: We knew we were going to get in really late and were just needing something in the neighborhood, so we did one of the name your price deals for the first time and came up with this...I was glad we did. We arrived at 1:15 in the morning and basically headed straight to bed. The beds were great - nice, clean, comfortable...great linens and lots of pillows. When we were able to explore just a bit in the morning, I noticed we had a flat screen TV, they now had plastic wrapped around the real glass glasses (so you know they're clean), the pool and fitness center were surprisingly nice (especially the fitness center) for what looked to be a slightly older hotel, and the newly redone lobby was fantastic. They had a nice business center that was free to use...and free WiFi. The staff was very friendly as well. I just wish we had time to use some of the things I just described. We checked them out because we were curious...but we really only used the room and the business center to print off a map. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: af847
Reviews.Content: Great re-done lobby and nice people at the front desk. The room was quiet and comfy, nice and clean. But my colleague had a problem with people partying in the courtyard below her room late at night, keeping her from sleeping. Myself, though; no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “lovely,cozy and had everything i needed!”
Reviews.Author: marirustad
Reviews.Content: washer ,drier,great breakfast for free was nice surprises!big rooms on a quiet location perfect to relax and work,they even have some social things going on.!i def. think courtyard is "homier" than the regualr marriots i have stayed at before-pleasant surprise!

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced and totally underwhelming”
Reviews.Author: Aquarius70
Reviews.Content: The front lobby staff were very helpful and friendly. However, the room was small, and the whole place seemed rather shabby. Compares VERY poorly with other similarly priced hotels where we have stayed the past 2 months.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend sporting event”
Reviews.Author: gjnbln
Reviews.Content: We booked 25 rooms for a sporting event. The staff was very accomodating. The rooms were decent size and the service was friendly. Not in the best area, as the neighborhood is a little rough (some vandelism happened outside the hotel)

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Special but OK”
Reviews.Author: lookingglass101
Reviews.Content: Pros: Large rooms Clean Decent Price Provided food/snacks/drinks in lobby Con: Dated Food was pretty bad Some rooms had drafty windows (but you could turn up the heat and be fine). Overall, this hotel is OK, nothing special but would be good for a business trip/cheap stay.

Reviews.Title: “Vandals and No Security”
Reviews.Author: BoozeBuster
Reviews.Content: This place should be avoided like the plague. Hotel had numerous cars vandalized over the July 4 holiday. Our car had the passenger side front window shattered while we away and using the park and fly service. Upon return, the front desk made mention that the claims dept. for Marriott would contact us and was nice about calling the police for the filing of a report, which was not done prior to our return. We did receive a call from the claims department 2 days later and we were told that Marriott would do NOTHING as far as the damage. As far as I am concerned, this is not over. As far as you are concerned, STAY AWAY!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “vandalism”
Reviews.Author: caroldianne81
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently stayed at this hotel because we had a very early morning flight to Mexico. During checkin, the hotel staff encouraged us to leave our car there during our week vacation. We agreed it would be easier to take the shuttle in the morning to the airport, and paid for the service. Unfortunately, the passenger side window was shattered and some small items were stolen from our car while we were gone. Although the hotel staff was somewhat accomodating, they were unconcerned. They acted as if this was a commonplace occurance, and no big deal. We contacted management after we got home to report what had happened. During the intial report, the manager was apologetic and told my husband that they would take care of us. Subsequent phone calls were unanswered and after 2 weeks we recieved a letter indicating that although they were sorry, there was nothing they could do. We are Marriott Rewards members and are very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service Courtyard”
Reviews.Author: terravisum
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at many airport Courtyard before and this one strike me as the most friendly one that I have been in yet. The staff made me feel welcome the moment I set foot in the lobby. I was quickly given my room key (404) within less than 1 minute. Finding the elevator took me a bit longer as the directions was not obvious. The hallway lighting is a bit darker than I would have liked but the room brightness more than made it up. The room is clean, airy and new. The king bed is using the new Courtyard bed package which has a layer of Temturpedic-type memory foam. I was a bit hesitant at first as I like my bed a bit on the firm side but after one night on it, I felt refreshed. One brownie point for the new Courtyard bed. Rounding out the room is the usual work-desk, TV and a sofa with a coffee table, all in brand new condition. The bathroom is roomy with the separate lavatory outside of the bathroom. The amenities is also seems to be updated from the old Courtyard that I have remembered (have not been in a Courtyard for a while). The hotel is a square building with an internal courtyard in the middle which is nicely kept and would make a good place to have an afternoon tea. Yes, it is that nice. The pool occupied in the one of the wing of the building with good view out to the courtyard. The shocker came when I went to the front-desk and ask for some detergent and fabric softener for my dirty laundry. They are given free of charge. Now, I am used to be charged for an arm and a leg for these things in other hotel and so shocked I walked away without asking for some coins for the machines. Another brownie point. This Courtyard is about 3 minutes away from the airport but noise control was very good. You have more to worry from the box AC than noise from the planes outside. I had an early flight the next morning at 6:00AM and the earliest shuttle was at 5AM. I was a bit worry as the shuttle seems to be shared between other Marriott properties in the areas and I was afraid that it would be long if it was going to make the round. However, the shuttle went straight to the airport once everyone at the Courtyard was in, YMMV. All in all, I was very impressed by this Courtyard. It is head and shoulder above the rest in the same category. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!”
Reviews.Author: Noelclaire
Reviews.Content: We only stayed overnight, but found the hotel to be above average in every way. The room was clean and well-appointed, though the bathroom is small. There were two up-to-date computers in the lobby for Internet email checking. The staff was pleasant and helpful. The location - near the Speedway Racetrack- was perfect for our family. I definitely recommend this hotel as a fine place to stay and a good value.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient for early morning travel out of Indianapolis”
Reviews.Author: indianatraveller
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay here the night before a very early flight and were pleasantly surprised. We booked a King Suite so that our daughter could get to sleep early; the bedroom was a separate room from the living room; pull out couch was comfortable with appropriate bedding. The bedding was above average (not Westin level, but decent). The hotel staff were very friendly, and the early morning shuttle service was prompt. The hotel allows you to pay a small fee to leave your vehicle in the hotel parking lot during your time away; and the shuttle will pick you up upon your return; It was $20 for an entire week; which was a great deal! We paid $148 which included room tax, continental breakfast and internet access. We got an extra hour of sleep before our flight since we didn't have to travel from home. We'd do it again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!! One of the best”
Reviews.Author: illiniguy620
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Courtyard for 2 nights in Indianapolis. We stayed for a large car show and the hotel was great. There was a large courtyard in the middle of the hotel, which made it super easy to get to the lobby or pool. The pool was nice and the hot tub was very big. There was a very convient store in the hotel next to the lobby that had ice cream, chips, snacks, and other little things to take back to the room. Breakfast was great!!! We've already booked our stay at the Courtyard for next year.

Reviews.Title: “Good, but nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Htown_Buck
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Courtyard Indianapolis Airport for one night on a business trip. While I would have prefered a hotel downtown, this location was fine. Very close to the airport and just a 10 minute drive from downtown. My check-in took less than a couple of minutes. It went fast and the person at the desk was very nice. My company got a weekend rate of $79. My room was located on the 2nd floor near the back entrance to the hotel. The room was your typical Courtyard hotel room. Nothing fancy, yet more than adequate. I had read some of the reviews that mentioned a recent renovation, so it was a surprise to me to find my room to be average. Maybe I'm wrong, but it didn't seem like it had been renovated lately. The bathroom was dark and dingy. The shower did put out a nice, steady stream of hot water. That is always a plus. The bed was a little on the soft side, but I tend to like soft mattresses so I didn't have a problem with that. The room was clean and showed no real signs of wear. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay close to the airport, but not too far from downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Quality hotel, good value”
Reviews.Author: dotdty86
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Courtyard Indianapolis Airport on a family trip and enjoyed the hotel. It appears to be recently renovated, with nicely furnished rooms and a clean facility throughout. The pool is small but well-maintained, and the courtyard area is quiet and inviting. Our weekend rate (around $90) included a breakfast buffet for the three of us in our family, so the value for our stay was very high. Parking is free and plentiful. The location is OK. Despite being next to the airport, there was hardly any airport noise. We were only 10 minutes from downtown, although the ramps are a little difficult to navigate to and from the hotel. There were also few restaurants, ATMs or even gas stations nearby ... this is not a typical hotel strip area.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: OhioRon
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel about a year ago, and they were undergoing a major renovation at that time. I stayed again two weeks ago and was very pleased. The rooms were spacious, very clean, and had new carpet. It's always nice to have free broadband internet access. The rate I found on the internet was quite good for a hotel of this quality. I'll stay here again the next time I'm in the area.
